span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 偷窃： to steal, often in a violation of trust
【例】 fearing that someone might attempt to purloin a copy of the script for the show's season finale 害怕该剧的完季那集剧本被盗
【近】 appropriate, filch, pilfer, snitch, thieve

【记】 pur 音：破 + loan 贷款，贷款破产了，还不起，所以偷窃；pur 破 + loin 腰，把腰部的东西(腰包)弄破→偷窃
